# Contributing

## Adding a new plugin to support (when approved in the next ECMAScript version)

### Update [`plugin-features.js`](DELETED_URL_WITH_CREDENTIALS"@babel/plugin-transform-exponentiation-operator": {
  features: [
    "exponentiation (**) operator",
  ],
},
```
